ygData.subject: Re: Hi all
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I still recommend the shovel method though if you are a relatively low level character and don t mind looking like a fool. If you re already in the Lake
ygData.messageBody:
--- In EverQuest@y..., "J. Smythe" <lgumaer@h...> wrote:
> Im not even going to bother with 1hb. Just 1hs, 2hs, piercing, 2hb,
I still recommend the shovel method though if you are a relatively
low level character and don't mind looking like a fool.

If you're already in the Lake Rathe area just pick up a Runed Totem
Staff. Just about any Gnoll you see on the north end with a staff
has one. It's a 9/47 magic weapon. They're lore so people just
leave them after a while. Any caster below 30 has one.

Tuldayen Grimblade
35th Season Ranger of Tunare

PS you can see by the name where me tastes lie!
